title: Rocking in the Sunshine
description: She wants to help, but can't see the risk she's taking.Shannon is thrilled to be along on tour with Wilder Side. As the official band photographer, she begins to grow closer and closer to the band. But how close is too close?He can't see through his jealousy.When Julian sees Shannon in Asher's arms, he retreats to his old ways - self-loathing and self-destruction. He aches for Shannon, but thinks she's abandoned him. He should have seen it coming. He shouldn't have opened his heart up. Not to anyone. Will a dream come true turn into a nightmare?
author: Aubrey Rose
